QuestData.Title: I'll Huff, I'll Puff...
QuestData.Description:
Murky is my favorite little fella. However, in order to lead a change in the murloc population here, he needs some awesome abilities.
There are a lot of pufferfish around in the water, and I think that they could be a good resource for him.
Kill a few and collect their eggs for Murky.
QuestData.CompletionText: Pufferfish have this impressive ability of... exploding. They could be a powerful tool for Murky.
QuestData.RewardText:
The pufferfish will be a perfect resource for Murky! I'll just whip up a spell to make them grow more quickly.
All he'll have to do is throw, then boom!
